https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l0jsEJn5KWdCxGQAy2CGO3y9TcS.jpg Created by Crystal Pite and Jonathon Young, the award-winning Betroffenheit is a boundary-stretching hybrid between theatre and dance that explores the psychological states of trauma, grief and addiction.
